definitions.text: a journey for some purpose (usually including the return)
examples: he took a trip to the shopping center

definitions.text: a hallucinatory experience induced by drugs
an accidental misstep threatening (or causing) a fall
examples: he blamed his slip on the ice
the jolt caused many slips and a few spills

definitions.text: a catch mechanism that acts as a switch
examples: the pressure activates the tripper and releases the water
he heard the trip of women's feet overhead
he recited the whole poem without a single trip
he arranged his robes to avoid a trip-up later

definitions.text: miss a step and fall or nearly fall
examples: She stumbled over the tree root
The questions on the test tripped him up

definitions.text: put in motion or move to act
